extendedInfo.description: A quiet night with a fire-lit lamp and fireflies. Decorate your home screen with a midnight firefly invasion. This is a low impact live wallpaper. It won't slow down your phone and it won't drain your battery.Includes a settings screen to control the number of fire flies.Art by Anne Paetzke. Please check out our other live wallpapers!

reviews.title: Stunning!
reviews.comment: One of my favorite LWPs from one of my favorite devs. Serene, gorgeous colors, calm &  peaceful. Love it!
reviews.author: Suki Niko

reviews.title: One of my favorites!
reviews.comment: Love this wallpaper, a day/night setting would make it perfect.
reviews.author: Melissa Lekatz

reviews.title: Best live wallpaper ever
reviews.comment: I like this live wallpaper because it\'s like a fairytale dream I think you should add moving trees to it that will make it look better
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Beautiful and serene.  Need I say more?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beautiful Wallpaper
reviews.comment: Beautiful wallpaper,  would like to see tree branches/leaf movement added.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: EASTERN GLOW WALLPAPER
reviews.comment: Beautiful!  Just lovely.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lovely
reviews.comment: This is so peaceful & beautiful looks gr8 on my HTC sensation
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is really nice. Too bad it doesn\'t fit screen fully on htc sensation. But I might keep anyway. Not that bad but the bottom corners.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really love the design of the wallpaper, however on my atrix the wallpaper doesn\'t fill the screen. Once this is updated I will raise my rating.

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work well on Xoom. Looks great on Evo 4G, though. Love the wallpaper.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Absolutely stunning and one of my definite favorites. Thanks to the dev for such amazing art. More please :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Something strange going on at bottom of screen. Fix and it gets 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be nice if all of their lwps had option for A2SD for storage when not in use. I have a Moto Droid w/ less than 99 MB internal & 13 GB SD..

reviews.comment: Love this it is so nice

reviews.comment: Lovely...a must buy wallpaper...

reviews.comment: I love it!

reviews.comment: Awesome wallpaper!!!

reviews.comment: Beautiful and serene-like meditation

reviews.title: So whats the difference
reviews.comment: Just purchased the upgraded version. Whats the difference between this one and the free version? I thougbt you\'d be able to do time of day changes,  add more colors, tbkngs like that. Please fix it. I will jn install till you do.
reviews.author: Patricia Bell

reviews.title: I love this..
reviews.comment: This only has a setting for how many fireflies. No box to check for CPU, and I had it as my lwp for awhile, but battery ran down fast.
reviews.author: A Google User
